record.id: field.name="ldap.dn.userid" and file.name="operator" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: ldap.dn.userid
record.file.name: operator

brief.brief: The distinguished name (DN) of the LDAP user you want the operator to use for LDAP authentication.

detail.detail: The LDAP Directory Service authenticates against this name in place of the operator name. This LDAP authentication uses the same mapping properties you define in LDAP setup, although no LDAP field mappings are required. If you do not map the operator table then Service Manager server immediately unbinds and disconnects from the LDAP Directory Service upon successful authentication.
